meanings.definition: The act of leading or presiding over a meeting or organization as a chairman.
meanings.sent1: During the chairmaning of the meeting, he made sure everyone had a chance to speak.
meanings.sent2: Her chairmaning of the organization was praised for its efficiency and fairness.
meanings.sent3: The chairmaning of the chess club meeting turned into a lively debate about the best strategies.
meanings.sent4: His chairmaning of the team was like a skilled conductor leading an orchestra to harmony.
meanings.sent5: The chairmaning of the book club made the discussions engaging and productive.

meanings.definition: The action of overseeing or managing a group or committee in a leadership role as a chairman.
meanings.sent1: The chairmaning of the project team ensured all tasks were completed on time.
meanings.sent2: His chairmaning of the committee brought unity and direction to their work.
meanings.sent3: The chairmaning of the bake sale committee resulted in record-breaking sales.
meanings.sent4: Her chairmaning of the volunteers was like guiding a ship through stormy seas.
meanings.sent5: The chairmaning of the charity event made a significant impact on the community.
